```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(StatsBombR)
```

```{r}
fc <- FreeCompetitions()
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
euro2020 <- fc %>%
  filter(competition_id==55)

euro2020matches <- FreeMatches(euro2020)

euro2020data <- allclean(free_allevents(MatchesDF = euro2020matches, Parallel = T))
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
euro2022 <- fc %>%
  filter(competition_id==53)

euro2022matches <- FreeMatches(euro2022)

euro2022data <- allclean(free_allevents(MatchesDF = euro2022matches, Parallel = T))
```

```{r}
euro2020 <- write.csv(euro2020data,"euro2020rawdata.csv")

euro2022 <- write.csv(euro2022data,"euro2022rawdata.csv")
```
